step1_title: Step 1: Connect your wallet and sign
tooltip_title: Why do I need to sign?
tooltip_description: Signing with Metamask does NOT risk your wallet. This is just to verify that you are the owner of the wallet. The system does not ask for coins, does not store your private key, and does not cost any gas fee. You can review the message before signing.
error_no_metamask: Please install Metamask extension in your browser.
